MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL53 postcode area of Abersoch, affecting properties in the local area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00PM to  carry out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 11.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.13PM on 5th November 2020.
